keyMoments.title: Sanji Crashes the Wedding
keyMoments.description: Sanji bursts into the chapel where Absalom is forcing Nami into marriage, spinning and singing. He kicks away the zombie holding Nami and catches her as she falls.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Sanji's devotion to protecting the women of his crew and sets up his confrontation with Absalom.

keyMoments.title: Multiple Kick Combo on Absalom
keyMoments.description: Sanji unleashes a devastating series of kicks on Absalom: Basses Cote, Longe, Tendron, Flanchet, Quasi, Queue, Cuisseau, and Jarret, overwhelming his 600-pound reinforced body.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's mastery of his fighting style and ability to harm even heavily modified opponents.

keyMoments.title: Uses Salt to Find Invisible Absalom
keyMoments.description: Sanji uses Usopp's special salt balls to reveal Absalom's position by covering part of his invisible body, then blasts him with Veau Shot.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's tactical thinking and ability to counter Devil Fruit abilities.

keyMoments.title: Hints at Deeper Grudge Against Absalom
keyMoments.description: Sanji reveals there's another reason beyond protecting Nami that makes him furious at Absalom, hinting at a personal connection to the Suke Suke no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the reveal about Sanji's lifelong dream of eating the Clear-Clear Fruit.

abilities.description: A powerful kick named after a cut of meat, part of Sanji's culinary-themed fighting style.
A kick technique named after a meat cut, part of Sanji's combination attacks.
A kick named after a meat cut, used in rapid succession with other techniques.
A kick technique named after a cut of meat.
A kick named after a meat cut.
A kick technique named after a meat cut.
A kick named after a cut of meat.
A kick technique named after a meat cut.
A powerful kick named after veal, used to knock back Absalom after revealing his invisible position.

relationships.description: Sanji battles Absalom to rescue Nami and reveals a deeper grudge related to the Suke Suke no Mi.

evolutionMoments.description: Sanji confronts Absalom in the chapel and overwhelms him with kick techniques.

reveals.information: Sanji hints at having a personal connection to the Suke Suke no Mi that goes beyond just rescuing Nami

keyMoments.title: Usopp's Pepper Star Trick
keyMoments.description: Usopp fakes an injury to lure Wild Zombies close, then uses Pepper Star to make them cough, leaving their mouths open for Salt Stars.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Usopp's tactical intelligence and creativity in combat.

keyMoments.title: Chandelier Fire Trap
keyMoments.description: Usopp's missed Firebird Star hits a chandelier, creating a fire that panics the Wild Zombies.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Usopp's adaptability in using environmental hazards.

keyMoments.title: Three-Way Chase with Kumashi and Perona
keyMoments.description: Usopp engages in a comedic chase sequence, running from Kumashi while pursuing Perona through the mansion.
keyMoments.significance: Provides comic relief while showing Kumashi's destructive power.

abilities.description: Usopp shoots pepper projectiles that make opponents cough and sneeze uncontrollably.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Gecko Moria
keyMoments.description: Luffy attempts to attack Moria directly, but Moria warns that only he can decide whether the shadows return to their owners.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the challenge that defeating Moria requires more than just force.

keyMoments.title: Falls for Doppelman Trick
keyMoments.description: Luffy's Gum-Gum Pistol passes through what appears to be Moria, revealed to be his shadow clone Doppelman.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the difficulty of fighting Moria and his tactical Devil Fruit use.

keyMoments.title: Uses Doppelman to Trick Luffy
keyMoments.description: Moria deploys his shadow clone Doppelman to take Luffy's attack, showing his tactical use of the Kage Kage no Mi.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates why Moria is a Warlord of the Sea.
keyMoments.quote: Even if you beat me, the shadows will never return to their owners. I'm the one who decides whether they go back or not!

keyMoments.title: Brick Bat Attack
keyMoments.description: Moria transforms his shadow into multiple bat-like creatures that swarm and bite Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Moria's offensive capabilities beyond creating zombies.

abilities.description: Moria transforms his shadow into multiple bat-like creatures that attack opponents.

keyMoments.title: Forces Wedding with Nami
keyMoments.description: Absalom attempts to force Nami into marriage before Sanji crashes the ceremony.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Absalom as a predatory villain and motivates Sanji's rescue.

keyMoments.title: Takes Devastating Damage from Sanji
keyMoments.description: Despite his 600-pound reinforced body, Absalom is overwhelmed by Sanji's kick combo.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Sanji can harm even heavily modified opponents.
keyMoments.quote: Leave Nami as my wife or be killed!

keyMoments.title: Uses Suke Suke no Mi Invisibility
keyMoments.description: Absalom turns invisible using his Clear-Clear Fruit powers to attempt escape from Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: Triggers Sanji's deeper emotional response related to the fruit.

relationships.description: Absalom fights Sanji who has both a protective motivation (Nami) and a deeper personal grudge.

evolutionMoments.description: Sanji overwhelms Absalom in combat and hints at a personal connection to his Devil Fruit.

keyMoments.title: Rescued from Forced Wedding
keyMoments.description: Nami is rescued by Sanji from Absalom's forced wedding ceremony.
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces the crew's protective bond and Sanji's devotion.

keyMoments.title: Flees from Usopp
keyMoments.description: Perona flees into the hallways with Usopp in pursuit while Kumashi protects her.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Perona's vulnerability when separated from her Negative Hollows.

keyMoments.title: Blocks Usopp from Reaching Perona
keyMoments.description: Kumashi intervenes to protect Perona, blocking Usopp's path and demonstrating his destructive power.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Kumashi as Perona's loyal guardian.

keyMoments.title: Destroys Pillars While Chasing Usopp
keyMoments.description: Kumashi demolishes mansion pillars in his rage while chasing Usopp.

relationships.description: Kumashi is Perona's most loyal zombie and protects her from danger.

evolutionMoments.description: Kumashi actively defends Perona from Usopp's pursuit.
